50 
51 class PlanExecution::DynamicReconfigureImpl
52 {
53 public:
54  DynamicReconfigureImpl(PlanExecution* owner)
55  : owner_(owner), dynamic_reconfigure_server_(ros::NodeHandle("~/plan_execution"))
56  {
57  dynamic_reconfigure_server_.setCallback(
58  boost::bind(&DynamicReconfigureImpl::dynamicReconfigureCallback, this, _1, _2));
59  }
60 
61 private:
62  void dynamicReconfigureCallback(PlanExecutionDynamicReconfigureConfig& config, uint32_t /*level*/)
63  {
64  owner_->setMaxReplanAttempts(config.max_replan_attempts);
65  owner_->setTrajectoryStateRecordingFrequency(config.record_trajectory_state_frequency);
66  }
67 
68  PlanExecution* owner_;
69  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<PlanExecutionDynamicReconfigureConfig> dynamic_reconfigure_server_;
70 };
71 } // namespace plan_execution
72 
73 plan_execution::PlanExecution::PlanExecution(
74  const planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr& planning_scene_monitor,
75  const trajectory_execution_manager::TrajectoryExecutionManagerPtr& trajectory_execution)
76  : node_handle_("~")
77  , planning_scene_monitor_(planning_scene_monitor)
78  , trajectory_execution_manager_(trajectory_execution)
79 {
80  if (!trajectory_execution_manager_)
81  trajectory_execution_manager_ = std::make_shared<trajectory_execution_manager::TrajectoryExecutionManager>(
82  planning_scene_monitor_->getRobotModel(), planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor());
83 
84  default_max_replan_attempts_ = 5;
85 
86  new_scene_update_ = false;
87 
88  // we want to be notified when new information is available
89  planning_scene_monitor_->addUpdateCallback(boost::bind(&PlanExecution::planningSceneUpdatedCallback, this, _1));
90 
91  // start the dynamic-reconfigure server
92  reconfigure_impl_ = new DynamicReconfigureImpl(this);
93 }
94 
95 plan_execution::PlanExecution::~PlanExecution()
96 {
97  delete reconfigure_impl_;
98 }
99 
100 void plan_execution::PlanExecution::stop()
101 {
102  preempt_.request();
103 }
104 
105 std::string plan_execution::PlanExecution::getErrorCodeString(const moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes& error_code)
106 {
107  if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS)
108  return "Success";
109  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GROUP_NAME)
110  return "Invalid group name";
111  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PLANNING_FAILED)
112  return "Planning failed.";
113  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN)
114  return "Invalid motion plan";
115  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::UNABLE_TO_AQUIRE_SENSOR_DATA)
116  return "Unable to aquire sensor data";
117  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::MOTION_PLAN_INVALIDATED_BY_ENVIRONMENT_CHANGE)
118  return "Motion plan invalidated by environment change";
119  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::CONTROL_FAILED)
120  return "Controller failed during execution";
121  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::TIMED_OUT)
122  return "Timeout reached";
123  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PREEMPTED)
124  return "Preempted";
125  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GOAL_CONSTRAINTS)
126  return "Invalid goal constraints";
127  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_OBJECT_NAME)
128  return "Invalid object name";
129  else if (error_code.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE)
130  return "Catastrophic failure";
131  return "Unknown event";
132 }
133 
134 void plan_execution::PlanExecution::planAndExecute(ExecutableMotionPlan& plan, const Options& opt)
135 {
136  plan.planning_scene_monitor_ = planning_scene_monitor_;
137  plan.planning_scene_ = planning_scene_monitor_->getPlanningScene();
138  planAndExecuteHelper(plan, opt);
139 }
140 
141 void plan_execution::PlanExecution::planAndExecute(ExecutableMotionPlan& plan,
142  const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& scene_diff, const Options& opt)
143 {
144  if (moveit::core::isEmpty(scene_diff))
145  planAndExecute(plan, opt);
146  else
147  {
148  plan.planning_scene_monitor_ = planning_scene_monitor_;
149  {
150  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO lscene(planning_scene_monitor_); // lock the scene so that it does
151  // not modify the world
152  // representation while diff() is
153  // called
154  plan.planning_scene_ = lscene->diff(scene_diff);
155  }
156  planAndExecuteHelper(plan, opt);
157  }
158 }
159 
160 void plan_execution::PlanExecution::planAndExecuteHelper(ExecutableMotionPlan& plan, const Options& opt)
161 {
162  // perform initial configuration steps & various checks
163  preempt_.checkAndClear(); // clear any previous preempt_ request
164 
165  bool preempt_requested = false;
166 
167  // run the actual motion plan & execution
168  unsigned int max_replan_attempts =
169  opt.replan_ ? (opt.replan_attempts_ > 0 ? opt.replan_attempts_ : default_max_replan_attempts_) : 1;
170  unsigned int replan_attempts = 0;
171  bool previously_solved = false;
172 
173  // run a planning loop for at most the maximum replanning attempts;
174  // re-planning is executed only in case of known types of failures (e.g., environment changed)
175  do
176  {
177  replan_attempts++;
178  ROS_INFO_NAMED("plan_execution", "Planning attempt %u of at most %u", replan_attempts, max_replan_attempts);
179 
180  if (opt.before_plan_callback_)
181  opt.before_plan_callback_();
182 
183  new_scene_update_ = false; // we clear any scene updates to be evaluated because we are about to compute a new
184  // plan, which should consider most recent updates already
185 
186  // if we never had a solved plan, or there is no specified way of fixing plans, just call the planner; otherwise,
187  // try to repair the plan we previously had;
188  bool solved =
189  (!previously_solved || !opt.repair_plan_callback_) ?
190  opt.plan_callback_(plan) :
191  opt.repair_plan_callback_(plan, trajectory_execution_manager_->getCurrentExpectedTrajectoryIndex());
192 
193  preempt_requested = preempt_.checkAndClear();
194  if (preempt_requested)
195  break;
196 
197  // if planning fails in a manner that is not recoverable, we exit the loop,
198  // otherwise, we attempt to continue, if replanning attempts are left
199  if (plan.error_code_.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PLANNING_FAILED ||
200  plan.error_code_.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN ||
201  plan.error_code_.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::UNABLE_TO_AQUIRE_SENSOR_DATA)
202  {
203  if (plan.error_code_.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::UNABLE_TO_AQUIRE_SENSOR_DATA && opt.replan_delay_ > 0.0)
204  {
205  ros::WallDuration d(opt.replan_delay_);
206  d.sleep();
207  }
208  continue;
209  }
210 
211  // abort if no plan was found
212  if (solved)
213  previously_solved = true;
214  else
215  break;
216 
217  if (plan.error_code_.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS)
218  {
219  if (opt.before_execution_callback_)
220  opt.before_execution_callback_();
221 
222  preempt_requested = preempt_.checkAndClear();
223  if (preempt_requested)
224  break;
225 
226  // execute the trajectory, and monitor its execution
227  plan.error_code_ = executeAndMonitor(plan, false);
228  }
229 
230  if (plan.error_code_.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PREEMPTED)
231  preempt_requested = true;
232 
233  // if execution succeeded or failed in a manner that we do not consider recoverable, we exit the loop (with failure)
234  if (plan.error_code_.val != moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::MOTION_PLAN_INVALIDATED_BY_ENVIRONMENT_CHANGE)
235  break;
236  else
237  {
238  // otherwise, we wait (if needed)
239  if (opt.replan_delay_ > 0.0)
240  {
241  ROS_INFO_NAMED("plan_execution", "Waiting for a %lf seconds before attempting a new plan ...",
242  opt.replan_delay_);
243  ros::WallDuration d(opt.replan_delay_);
244  d.sleep();
245  ROS_INFO_NAMED("plan_execution", "Done waiting");
246  }
247  }
248 
249  preempt_requested = preempt_.checkAndClear();
250  if (preempt_requested)
251  break;
252 
253  } while (replan_attempts < max_replan_attempts);
254 
255  if (preempt_requested)
256  {
257  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("plan_execution", "PlanExecution was preempted");
258  plan.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PREEMPTED;
259  }
260 
261  if (opt.done_callback_)
262  opt.done_callback_();
263 
264  if (plan.error_code_.val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS)
265  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("plan_execution", "PlanExecution finished successfully.");
266  else
267  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("plan_execution", "PlanExecution terminating with error code %d - '%s'", plan.error_code_.val,
268  getErrorCodeString(plan.error_code_).c_str());
269 }
270 
271 bool plan_execution::PlanExecution::isRemainingPathValid(const ExecutableMotionPlan& plan,
272  const std::pair<int, int>& path_segment)
273 {
274  if (path_segment.first >= 0 &&
275  plan.plan_components_[path_segment.first].trajectory_monitoring_) // If path_segment.second <= 0, the function
276  // will fallback to check the entire trajectory
277  {
278  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO lscene(plan.planning_scene_monitor_); // lock the scene so that it
279  // does not modify the world
280  // representation while
281  // isStateValid() is called
282  const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory& t = *plan.plan_components_[path_segment.first].trajectory_;
283  const collision_detection::AllowedCollisionMatrix* acm =
284  plan.plan_components_[path_segment.first].allowed_collision_matrix_.get();
285  std::size_t wpc = t.getWayPointCount();
286  collision_detection::CollisionRequest req;
287  req.group_name = t.getGroupName();
288  for (std::size_t i = std::max(path_segment.second - 1, 0); i < wpc; ++i)
289  {
290  collision_detection::CollisionResult res;
291  if (acm)
292  plan.planning_scene_->checkCollisionUnpadded(req, res, t.getWayPoint(i), *acm);
293  else
294  plan.planning_scene_->checkCollisionUnpadded(req, res, t.getWayPoint(i));
295 
296  if (res.collision || !plan.planning_scene_->isStateFeasible(t.getWayPoint(i), false))
297  {
298  // call the same functions again, in verbose mode, to show what issues have been detected
299  plan.planning_scene_->isStateFeasible(t.getWayPoint(i), true);
300  req.verbose = true;
301  res.clear();
302  if (acm)
303  plan.planning_scene_->checkCollisionUnpadded(req, res, t.getWayPoint(i), *acm);
304  else
305  plan.planning_scene_->checkCollisionUnpadded(req, res, t.getWayPoint(i));
306  return false;
307  }
308  }
309  }
310  return true;
311 }
312 
313 moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes plan_execution::PlanExecution::executeAndMonitor(ExecutableMotionPlan& plan,
314  bool reset_preempted)
315 {
316  if (reset_preempted)
317  preempt_.checkAndClear();
318 
319  if (!plan.planning_scene_monitor_)
320  plan.planning_scene_monitor_ = planning_scene_monitor_;
321  if (!plan.planning_scene_)
322  plan.planning_scene_ = planning_scene_monitor_->getPlanningScene();
323 
324  moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes result;
325 
326  // try to execute the trajectory
327  execution_complete_ = true;
328 
329  if (!trajectory_execution_manager_)
330  {
331  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("plan_execution", "No trajectory execution manager");
332  result.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::CONTROL_FAILED;
333  return result;
334  }
335 
336  if (plan.plan_components_.empty())
337  {
338  result.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
339  return result;
340  }
341 
342  execution_complete_ = false;
343 
344  // push the trajectories we have slated for execution to the trajectory execution manager
345  int prev = -1;
346  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < plan.plan_components_.size(); ++i)
347  {
348  // \todo should this be in trajectory_execution ? Maybe. Then that will have to use kinematic_trajectory too;
349  // spliting trajectories for controllers becomes interesting: tied to groups instead of joints. this could cause
350  // some problems
351  // in the meantime we do a hack:
352 
353  bool unwound = false;
354  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < i; ++j)
355  // if we ran unwind on a path for the same group
356  if (plan.plan_components_[j].trajectory_ &&
357  plan.plan_components_[j].trajectory_->getGroup() == plan.plan_components_[i].trajectory_->getGroup() &&
358  !plan.plan_components_[j].trajectory_->empty())
359  {
360  plan.plan_components_[i].trajectory_->unwind(plan.plan_components_[j].trajectory_->getLastWayPoint());
361  unwound = true;
362  break;
363  }
364 
365  if (!unwound)
366  {
367  // unwind the path to execute based on the current state of the system
368  if (prev < 0)
369  plan.plan_components_[i].trajectory_->unwind(
370  plan.planning_scene_monitor_ && plan.planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor() ?
371  *plan.planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor()->getCurrentState() :
372  plan.planning_scene_->getCurrentState());
373  else
374  plan.plan_components_[i].trajectory_->unwind(plan.plan_components_[prev].trajectory_->getLastWayPoint());
375  }
376 
377  if (plan.plan_components_[i].trajectory_ && !plan.plan_components_[i].trajectory_->empty())
378  prev = i;
379 
380  // convert to message, pass along
381  moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory msg;
382  plan.plan_components_[i].trajectory_->getRobotTrajectoryMsg(msg);
383  if (!trajectory_execution_manager_->push(msg, plan.plan_components_[i].controller_names_))
384  {
385  trajectory_execution_manager_->clear();
386  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("plan_execution", "Apparently trajectory initialization failed");
387  execution_complete_ = true;
388  result.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::CONTROL_FAILED;
389  return result;
390  }
391  }
392 
393  if (!trajectory_monitor_ && planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor())
394  {
395  // Pass current value of reconfigurable parameter plan_execution/record_trajectory_state_frequency
396  double sampling_frequency = 0.0;
397  node_handle_.getParam("plan_execution/record_trajectory_state_frequency", sampling_frequency);
398  trajectory_monitor_ = std::make_shared<planning_scene_monitor::TrajectoryMonitor>(
399  planning_scene_monitor_->getStateMonitor(), sampling_frequency);
400  }
401 
402  // start recording trajectory states
403  if (trajectory_monitor_)
404  trajectory_monitor_->startTrajectoryMonitor();
405 
406  // start a trajectory execution thread
407  trajectory_execution_manager_->execute(boost::bind(&PlanExecution::doneWithTrajectoryExecution, this, _1),
408  boost::bind(&PlanExecution::successfulTrajectorySegmentExecution, this, &plan,
409  _1));
410  // wait for path to be done, while checking that the path does not become invalid
411  ros::Rate r(100);
412  path_became_invalid_ = false;
413  bool preempt_requested = false;
414 
415  while (node_handle_.ok() && !execution_complete_ && !path_became_invalid_)
416  {
417  r.sleep();
418  // check the path if there was an environment update in the meantime
419  if (new_scene_update_)
420  {
421  new_scene_update_ = false;
422  std::pair<int, int> current_index = trajectory_execution_manager_->getCurrentExpectedTrajectoryIndex();
423  if (!isRemainingPathValid(plan, current_index))
424  {
425  ROS_INFO_NAMED("plan_execution", "Trajectory component '%s' is invalid after scene update",
426  plan.plan_components_[current_index.first].description_.c_str());
427  path_became_invalid_ = true;
428  break;
429  }
430  }
431 
432  preempt_requested = preempt_.checkAndClear();
433  if (preempt_requested)
434  break;
435  }
436 
437  // stop execution if needed
438  if (preempt_requested)
439  {
440  ROS_INFO_NAMED("plan_execution", "Stopping execution due to preempt request");
441  trajectory_execution_manager_->stopExecution();
442  }
443  else if (path_became_invalid_)
444  {
445  ROS_INFO_NAMED("plan_execution", "Stopping execution because the path to execute became invalid"
446  "(probably the environment changed)");
447  trajectory_execution_manager_->stopExecution();
448  }
449  else if (!execution_complete_)
450  {
451  ROS_WARN_NAMED("plan_execution", "Stopping execution due to unknown reason."
452  "Possibly the node is about to shut down.");
453  trajectory_execution_manager_->stopExecution();
454  }
455 
456  // stop recording trajectory states
457  if (trajectory_monitor_)
458  {
459  trajectory_monitor_->stopTrajectoryMonitor();
460  plan.executed_trajectory_ =
461  std::make_shared<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory>(planning_scene_monitor_->getRobotModel(), "");
462  trajectory_monitor_->swapTrajectory(*plan.executed_trajectory_);
463  }
464 
465  // decide return value
466  if (path_became_invalid_)
467  result.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::MOTION_PLAN_INVALIDATED_BY_ENVIRONMENT_CHANGE;
468  else
469  {
470  if (preempt_requested)
471  {
472  result.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PREEMPTED;
473  }
474  else
475  {
476  if (trajectory_execution_manager_->getLastExecutionStatus() ==
477  moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::SUCCEEDED)
478  result.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
479  else if (trajectory_execution_manager_->getLastExecutionStatus() ==
480  moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus::TIMED_OUT)
481  result.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::TIMED_OUT;
482  else
483  result.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::CONTROL_FAILED;
484  }
485  }
486  return result;
487 }
488 
489 void plan_execution::PlanExecution::planningSceneUpdatedCallback(
490  const planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitor::SceneUpdateType update_type)
491 {
492  if (update_type & (planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitor::UPDATE_GEOMETRY |
493  planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitor::UPDATE_TRANSFORMS))
494  new_scene_update_ = true;
495 }
496 
497 void plan_execution::PlanExecution::doneWithTrajectoryExecution(
498  const moveit_controller_manager::ExecutionStatus& /*status*/)
499 {
500  execution_complete_ = true;
501 }
502 
503 void plan_execution::PlanExecution::successfulTrajectorySegmentExecution(const ExecutableMotionPlan* plan,
504  std::size_t index)
505 {
506  if (plan->plan_components_.empty())
507  {
508  ROS_WARN_NAMED("plan_execution", "Length of provided motion plan is zero.");
509  return;
510  }
511 
512  // if any side-effects are associated to the trajectory part that just completed, execute them
513  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("plan_execution", "Completed '%s'", plan->plan_components_[index].description_.c_str());
514  if (plan->plan_components_[index].effect_on_success_)
515  if (!plan->plan_components_[index].effect_on_success_(plan))
516  {
517  // execution of side-effect failed
518  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("plan_execution", "Execution of path-completion side-effect failed. Preempting.");
519  preempt_.request();
520  return;
521  }
522 
523  // if there is a next trajectory, check it for validity, before we start execution
524  ++index;
525  if (index < plan->plan_components_.size() && plan->plan_components_[index].trajectory_ &&
526  !plan->plan_components_[index].trajectory_->empty())
527  {
528  std::pair<int, int> next_index(static_cast<int>(index), 0);
529  if (!isRemainingPathValid(*plan, next_index))
530  {
531  ROS_INFO_NAMED("plan_execution", "Upcoming trajectory component '%s' is invalid",
532  plan->plan_components_[next_index.first].description_.c_str());
533  path_became_invalid_ = true;
534  }
535  }
536 }
